text: mariyu varu tama carmalanu (avayavalanu) adugutaru: "Mirenduku maku vyatirekanga saksyamistunnaru?" Avi ila samadhanamistayi: "Prati vastuvuku matlade sakti prasadincina allah ye mam'malni matladimpa jesadu." Mariyu ayane mim'malni modatisari srstincina vadu, mariyu ayana vaipunake miranta maralimpabadataru
